content.question: Suppose the Boolean expression  j < numList.size()  in line 4 of the method is replaced with  j <= numList.size() - 1.  Which of the following best explains the effect of this change?

choices.label: It has no effect on the behavior of the method.
It causes the method to ignore the last element in numList.
It causes an IndexOutOfBoundsException  to be thrown.
It changes the number of times the loop executes, but all elements in numList will still be accessed.

content.answer: It has no effect on the behavior of the method.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
